summary: This bill mandates that institutions of higher education report to the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System (SEVIS) if they become aware that a student with an F-1 or J-1 visa has endorsed or supported a foreign terrorist organization. The Secretary of State is required to revoke the visa of any student found to have engaged in such activity, and the Secretary of Homeland Security must then initiate removal proceedings. Definitions for "foreign terrorist organization," "institution of higher education," and "SEVIS" are also provided.
